comprehensive_overview: OpenPMIX is an open-source package specifically designed for multi-party computation (MPC) applications, providing efficient and secure protocols for combining data from multiple parties without revealing individual inputs. It supports a range of MPC protocols and functionalities for privacy-preserving computations.
core_features: Supports various MPC protocols, efficient and secure data combination, privacy-preserving computations, open-source and customizable for different applications.
